amendment.description: To provide additional priorities for an energy workforce pilot grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3265 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3265 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191) To provide additional priorities for an energy workforce pilot grant program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3265 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3265 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
